hooks.command: terminal-notifier -title 'Claude Code' -subtitle 'Session Complete' -message "Finished working in $(basename "$PWD")" -sound default -timeout 10
echo 'Agent completed - running compact and save' && claude compact --save-to $CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR/knowledge/$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S)-agent-summary.md

echo 'Synchronizing memory bank with latest changes' && claude task --subagent-type memory-bank-synchronizer --description 'Sync memory bank' --prompt 'Synchronize memory bank files with current codebase state after agent completion. Update patterns, decisions, and active context based on recent changes and discoveries.'

echo 'Session starting - validating memory bank' && claude task --subagent-type memory-bank-synchronizer --description 'Session start sync' --prompt 'Validate memory bank accuracy at session start. Check if CLAUDE-patterns.md, CLAUDE-decisions.md, and CLAUDE-activeContext.md reflect current codebase state.'
